creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
A fresh install from Lenya 1.4 revision 420943 results in a Kupu that can not be
used. The layout of the editor is completely messed up. The one error that does
display is a 404: The requested document '/doctypes/kupublank.html' with
document-id '/doctypes/kupublank' does not exist.

Created attachment 18770
usecase-kupu.xmap patch

This patch updates Kupu for using uuid's, and opening and saving documents now
works.	Previously there were 404 errors when opening a document. 

I will also try to move the pipelines from usecase-kupu into the kupu module.
creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39890 ***
creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
